title: Contact Us
heading: How can we
subheading: If you need help using this platform, you’ve spotted something you’d like to talk about, or if you have questions about Dovetail, we’re right here.

contactAddressCard.name: If you want to send us mail
contactAddressCard.heading: We’d always encourage you to use one of the options above first, so we can try to help you faster. But if you need to send us documents or letters, you can write to:
contactAddressCard.cardExternalLink: If you need to file a claim

link.namePartTwo: for a list of claims contacts by carrier
link.label: here

contactCard1.name: Live Chat
contactCard1.heading: MY CLIENTS
contactCard1.subheading: Talk to the team and get quick answers to your questions – Monday - Friday 8:00 AM - 9:00 PM ET

contactCard2.name: Phone
contactCard2.heading: MY CLIENTS
contactCard2.subheading: We’re here Monday to Friday, 8:00 AM - 9:00 PM ET.

contactCard3.name: Email
contactCard3.heading: MY CLIENTS
contactCard3.subheading: One of our team members will get back to you as soon as possible.
